TaxonIdentification.subspecies_name: 云雾薹草 ( 原亚种) yun wu tai cao (yuan ya zhong)

treatment.description: Spikes many, ca. 5 mm wide. Utricles light green, lanceolate-ovate, ca. 3 × 1 mm.
treatment.distribution: Streamsides, forest margins and roadsides on slopes; (1100–) 1500–3700 m. Gansu, Guizhou, Ningxia, Shaanxi, Xizang, Yunnan [?Afghanistan, India, Indonesia (Java), Nepal, ?Pakistan, Sri Lanka, Vietnam].
